about_the_game:
Miniko is an advanced 2D avatar creation tool that brings your streaming persona to life with rich customization options. Whether you're crafting a playful character or aiming for a striking, anime-inspired look, Miniko provides everything you need to stand out.

Design your avatar with a wide selection of customizable outfits, wings, tails, colors, and special effects. Choose from various anime-inspired facial expressions—happy, sad, or mad—each with its unique visual flair. Seamlessly integrate your avatar with your favorite streaming platforms such as OBS and Streamlabs, featuring natural mouth movement, blinking, and gestures that bring realism and personality to your streams.

Miniko also offers interactive visual effects, including striking anime-inspired visuals and captivating elements like glowing auras and shimmering butterflies. These effects enhance your avatar's presence, adding a unique flair to your streams.

name: Miniko

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: Miniko is a 2D avatar tool for streamers, offering customizable outfits, wings, tails, and expressions. Avatars integrate with OBS and Streamlabs, featuring mouth movement, blinking, and anime-inspired facial expressions and visuals to enhance interactive streaming.
